document_data.name: Greigor Kundknoddick
document_data.mainbody: '''Greigor Kundknoddick''' was a [[frost giant]] jarl in the late 15th century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Greigor was the leader of a frost giant tribe that allied with [[drow]] and [[orc]]s during the [[Darkening]]. 

In [[1485 DR]], during the late stages of the [[War of the Silver Marches]], Greigor was  approached by [[Jarlaxle]], who suggested he withdraw his troops in the wake of the imminent defeat of [[Many-Arrows]].
